title: Recruiter
job_overview:
We’re looking for a proactive, tech-savvy recruiter to join our team. You’ll manage the full recruitment cycle—especially focused on real estate & bookkeeping hiring. If you’re great at building relationships, working independently, and sourcing top talent remotely, we’d love to meet you!

What You’ll Do:

Work closely with clients (mainly in real estate) to understand their hiring needs

Source qualified candidates using job boards, social media, referrals, and more

Screen and interview candidates to ensure skills, fit, and readiness

Coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers

Handle salary discussions and offer negotiations

Build and manage a talent pipeline for future hiring

Lead recruitment team by improving processes

Track key recruitment metrics and provide performance reports


Requirements
2+ years of full-cycle recruitment experience, preferably remote
Strong background in real estate hiring is preferred but not required 
Excellent communication and people skills
Proactive, organized, and can manage multiple roles independently
Tech-savvy — comfortable using and understanding ATS (knowledge in Recruit is preferred) and recruitment tools
Experience working with global clients


Benefits
Paid Time Off (PTO)
HMO
